title: The Madness Project
text:
The Madness Project is travel expedition from Kolkata to Mumbai undertaken by two undergraduate students of IIT Kharagpur in 2014. Siddharth Agarwal and Ujjawal Chauhan rode around over 2000 km entirely on cycle to raise funds for different causes and to witness the lives of people in India’s unseen terrain. [ 1 ] The entire journey took them over a month and also helped raise ₹ 80,000 for CRY . [ 2 ]
The duo had to ride for over six to twelve hours a day covering between 60-100 km. [ 3 ]
